io.micronaut.security.oauth2.openid.endpoints.authorization

Class DefaultStateProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.security.oauth2.openid.endpoints.authorization.DefaultStateProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StateProvider

    @Singleton
public class DefaultStateProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements StateProvider
    A default state provider that stores the original request URI to redirect back to after authentication.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    James Kleeh
